name: BOUTIQUE EVENT SERVICES
description:
Our job at Soirée Boutique is to minimize your stress and maximize your pleasure throughout your entire event experience. We try to cater to everyone's needs and offer personalized service to each individual. We want to make your party or event as unique and special as you are, anything you can think of, we'll try to make it happen. 

We offer specific packages for all events and offer additional services to try to make your experience one of a kind. We do corporate events, weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, retirement parties, grand openings, baby showers, holiday parties, kids parties, couples nights, bachelor parties, shopping parties, spa parties, happy hours, ladies nights, movie nights, game night, graduation parties, photo parties....any kind of party!

Besides, our event planning services we offer a wide range of products like favors and centerpieces. We also offer referrals to partner vendors, such as photographers, bakers, florist, make-up artist, caterers and hair stylist. Please be sure to check out our FULL list of additional services.

We are located in Maryland, catering to the DMV area. All consultations are FREE, please contact us today:

443-379-2043 or soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com 
Also, check us out on Instagram @soiree_boutique

name: PHOTO PARTY
description:
"Photo Party" includes a private upscale venue (all night), cupcakes, a photographer, and basic party decorations. A "Photo Party" starts at 500.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Photo Party" and pricing details.

name: LADIES NIGHT
description:
"Ladies Night" includes a private upscale venue (all night), cupcakes, basic party decorations, a fun party theme and is hosted by Soirée Boutique or a partner vendor. "Ladies Night" starts at $600.00, add-ons are available. 

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Ladies Night" and pricing details.

name: MOVIE NIGHT
description:
"Movie Night" includes a private theatre for your movie viewing experience and snacks and drinks for you and your guest. "Movie Night" starts at $550.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Movie Night" and pricing details.

name: KIDS PARTY
description:
"Kids Party" vary in theme and age appropraiteness, a basic "Kids Partie" package includes theme coordinated decoartions and a cake. "Kids Party" packages start at $350.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Kids Parties" and pricing details.

name: COUPLES NIGHT
description:
"Couples Night" includes a private upscale venue (all night) and ambiance appropriate decorations. "Couples Night" starts at $325.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Couples Night" and pricing details.

name: GAME NIGHT
description:
"Game Night" includes a private upscale venue (all night), host team decorations, light snacks and non-alcoholic beverages. "Game Night" starts at $325.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Game Night" and pricing details.

name: SPA DAY
description:
A "Spa Day" can also be a "Spa Night" and may include one person, a couple, or a group of friends; each spa package is tailored to the needs of the client. "Spa Day" packages may include manicures, pedicures, massages, facials and waxing services. "Spa Day" packages start at $300.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Spa Day" and pricing details.

name: WEDDING COORDINATOR
description:
"Wedding Coordinator" services vary from complete event planning to day-of coordinator services. We will help you plan your wedding from the picking out rings to the bachelor party to writing wedding vows, no detail is too small to consider for one of the biggest days of your life. Day-of "Wedding Coordinator" services start at 300.00, additional services are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Wedding Coordinator" services and pricing details.

name: PARTY VAN
description:
"Party Van" packages vary, all packages include a driver. The "Party Van" can be booked for road trips, shopping trips, girls or guys night out or amusement park trips. The party van can be booked for something as minute as local designated driver services or extended stays out of town. Overnight packages that include hotel accommodations are available. "Party Van" packages start at $175.00, add-ons are available.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of "Party Van" services and pricing details.

name: MAKE BELIEVE
description: "Make Believe" includes dress-up characters for child parties. Any character.....Princess, Elmo, Clown, Easter Bunny, Dinosaur, Dora, Easter Bunny, Cat in the Hat, Care Bears, Santa Claus.....so many more. "Make Believe" characters start at $150.00 for the first hour, each additional hour is $65.

name: CARD BOX
description:
The "Card Box" is a Soirée Boutique specialty item and a client favorite. The card box is a beautiful and secure place to hold your cards, gift cards, gift certificates, cash and checks during your wedding, party or event. The card box can be used as a party decoration or centerpiece and can also be saved a memory or keepsake of your event. "Card Box" designs start at $60.00.

The "Card Box" also has an upgraded version which includes a lock and key, called the "Donation Box", most useful for non-profit foundations or fundraisers. Please be sure to specify when you place your order, the "Donation Box" is an additional fee.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for different variations of the "Card Box" and pricing details.

name: SERVERS/BARTENDERS/PARTY HOST
description:
Sometimes our clients have the entire party planning duties under control, but need additional hands to help the party run smoothly. We offer a connection to banquet trained servers, bartenders and party host. Rates usually start at $25.00 per hour.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for additional information, rates and availability.

name: FAVORS
description:
"Favors" vary from client to client, based on the event, the need and the sentiment the client wishes to convey with the favor. "Favors" range from very basic to very excessive and fabulous. Most favors are handmade or personalized and are usually made to order. "Favors" start at $3.00 per favor, greater discounts are available for larger favor orders.

Please call 443-379-2043 or email soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com for options available to decide what kind of "Favors" are best suited for your event and pricing details.

name: ADD-ONS
description:
Any of the following can be added to your party package for an additional cost by contacting Soirée Boutique 443-379-2043 or soireeboutique.thepartyshop@gmail.com:

Platters
Desserts
Flowers
Favors
Vendors Services/Referrals
Transportation Services
Balloon Arrangements
Invites
Flyers
Centerpieces
Card Box
Wine/Champagne/Liquor
Servers/Bartenders
Kiddie Bottle Service
DJ's
Live Bands
Moon Bounce Rentals
Characters
Security Guards

If it is not listed here, please ask, of course we'll do our best to accommodate you!
